gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 115, Hawks 114
gameRecap.excerpt: Miles Bridges knocks down the go-ahead shot in the final seconds as Charlotte defeats Atlanta, 115-114. For Charlotte, Brandon Miller led the way with 27 points (five 3PM) while aided by Tre Mann (16 points, seven assists, career-high seven steals) in the victory. Bogdan Bogdanovic finished with 19 points (five 3PM) and eight assists for Atlanta in the losing effort. Charlotte improves to 20-60, while Atlanta moves to 36-44 with the loss.
